heroText: Born and raised in Italy, after travel around the world I finally settled in the sunny Barcelona, Spain. Well organized person, problem solver, with high attention to details. Looking forward to work in ambitious projects with positive people.
aboutHeadLine: I love create modern websites and apps.
aboutDescription: I’m always looking for new challenges and opportunities that can help me continue to become a better developer, and person overall. I have a passion for self-learning the latest techniques and tools. Improving each day to challenge my skills to become better at what I do.
UX/UI: I design detail-oriented visual interfaces based on the latest design models and trends. I build prototypes to evaluate user interfaces and design solutions.
Front: I develop websites and apps using the latest techniques. I believe that all products should be built with a strong focus on accessibility, performance and user interaction.
Back: I develop APIs to handle the business logic. Following the best architecture pattern and Solid principle. Always keeping in mind the performance and scalability.
latestWorksDescription: Here a couple of projects that I have done during the last period, if you are interested in seeing more on the topic, you will find
blogDescription: The Blog: Thoughts on life, work and everything in between.
contactText: I'm currently available for freelance work. If you have a project that you want to get started or just fancy saying hey, get in touch.
workTitle: Projects I've been working on lately
memoriesSummary: A simple social media app that allows users to post interesting events that happened in their lives.
memoriesDescription:
A simple social media app that allows users to post interesting events that happened in their lives.

The app allows users to view all posts, author profile, search posts by tag or title. If you are logged in, you can create, edit or delete a post, follow other users, comment on their posts and like them.

Build with React, Redux, NodeJs, Express, Mongodb and styled-components.
apollofySummary: Music platform inspired by Spotify, that allow users to share music with his friends.
apollofyDescription:
Music platform inspired by Spotify, that allow users to share music with his friends.

Once registered you can upload songs, create, edit and remove playlists, follow other users, save their playlists or songs as favorites. Search for artists, songs or playlists.

Built with React, Redux, Tailwind, NodeJs, Express, MongoDB, FireBase.
trackerSummary: Keep track of your transactions with this app that show you a nice graph.
trackerDescription:
Keep track of your transactions with this app that show you a nice graph.

Once you are registered, you can use this application to record your transactions, adding items such as income or expenses.

Built using React, Context API, Material-UI, FireBase.
todoSummary: Classic todo app with a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop for reordering.
todoDescription:
Classic todo app with a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop for reordering.

The application allows the user to create a new item, set it as completed and remove it. You can also filter items based on its status: active, completed, or both.

Built with React, Redux and styled-components.
punkApiSummary: Website that use the Punk API V2 to fetch Brewdog's beers and display it.
punkApiDescription:
Website that use the Punk API V2 to fetch Brewdog's beers and display it.

The application allows users to see all the beer in the API, read the information about it and save it as a favorite.

Built using React, punk API V2, and Material UI.
blogTitle: The Blog: Random thoughts on technology
formDescription: If you’d like to chat about a project please fill in the form below and I’ll get back within 1-2 days.
formNameErrorWrong: Name must contain only and at least 3 letters

error404HeadLine: You are in the middle of nowhere
error404Description: It’s embarrassing... This page does not seem to exist! This might be because you have typed the web address incorrectly, please check the spelling.
